questions.question: What media query condition targets minimum screen width?
questions.explanation: min-width applies styles at or above specified widths.

questions.question: What media query condition targets maximum screen width?
questions.explanation: max-width applies styles at or below specified widths.

questions.question: What Grid function creates responsive column sizes?
questions.explanation: minmax defines flexible min and max column sizes.

questions.question: What Grid value automatically fits columns?
questions.explanation: auto-fit adjusts columns to fill available space.

questions.question: What Grid value automatically fills columns?
questions.explanation: auto-fill creates as many columns as possible.

questions.question: What Flexbox property wraps items to new lines?
questions.explanation: flex-wrap allows items to wrap responsively.

questions.question: What property hides elements on specific screens?
What media feature detects device orientation?
What CSS function calculates responsive values?
questions.explanation: calc performs calculations for responsive sizing.

questions.question: What unit scales relative to root font size?
questions.explanation: rem units scale based on root element.
